title: Vikings defense up to challenge against Lions
content:
MINNEAPOLIS — After taking a pounding a week ago, the Minnesota Vikings defense had a nice bounce-back game on Sunday. 
  
The Vikings limited Detroit to a mere 38 yards rushing on 16 attempts in a 26-16 win over the Lions at TCF Bank Stadium in front of 52,319 fans.
